body:
@Osmose @mythmon Do we want filters to be exact matches? For instance, here the `German` filter is applied, but recipes are filtered out if _any_ of the locale values are `de`. Do we want it so that if a filter is applied, only recipes with that exact match are shown?

![screen shot 2016-11-30 at 8 55 07 am](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2767162/20759565/77a0184c-b6da-11e6-916f-661f85e95536.png)
